item.title: Anger is a defining character trait for both parties, new study shows
item.description: An updated Pew study shows that, with the change in administrations and party power in Congress, Democrats are now at record levels of anger toward go...

item.title: Why Miami’s Trump backers are clashing with the ‘America First’ wing over Venezuela
item.description: As Trump threatens strongman Nicolás Maduro, Venezuelan and Cuban American supporters are urging the president to do whatever it takes to oust him.

item.title: Trump struggles to persuade Americans to ignore affordability issues
item.description: A president who has often seemed to float above the laws of politics confronts a new political reality.

item.title: Rep. Grijalva says ICE agents pepper sprayed her at Tucson restaurant raid
item.description: ICE agents deployed both tear gas and pepper balls at protesters, video obtained by The Post shows.
